homepageHeadingText: Unlock the Power of AI for Recruiting Best Talent
homepageSubHeadingText: Marcus is an AI-powered tool that helps you find the best talent around the world.
step-1-1: Start by logging in to your Mercor
step-2-2: For ex. 'I need a react developer'
step-2-3: Top talented developer will be displayed to you.
searchIconAlt: white arrow head inside a purple circle
somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
chatHeroAlt: Purple banner showing world map with dots and also a man sitting on chair working with his laptop and few books are also stacked on table.
chatIntro: Hello, I'm Marcus, your AI hiring assistant. Describe your ideal hiring, and I will go through hundreds of thousands of people to discover the best fit.
chatIntro2: So tell me, How can I help?
